name: David Ramirez
text: Hmm, I get mixed feels on not-so-competen t Ren. Kinda feel like, if he's that so-so, hopefully we see other darksiders in the next movies, but most likely he'll be supposed to suddenly be boosted from 'completing his training.'    Like, in ep. 4, Luke is trained just enough to touch the Force, and he uses it to be super-pilot. But even after training with Yoda in 5, Vader manhandles him and easily chops his hand off. Actually, not sure what the canon says, but my headcanon is that Luke was on Dagobah for weeks while Han and Leia were fixing the Falcon and then waiting around while Lando gave them the runaround  =P    So, Ren being the only apprentice of Snoke we see (another minor quibble: kind of a lousy name) is a bit underwhelming given that total zero training Rey gets force visions from just touching a lightsaber and can instantly handle herself. Even with the wounded KR.
